articles.description: The process itself, to Jeff Duchin, is a great thing. "We're now sequencing approximately six percent of our SARS-CoV2 viruses," said Duchin, Public Health-Seattle & King County’s Health Officer. That number may not seem like a lot, but to the Centers f…

articles.title: US health care workers skeptical about COVID-19 vaccines, survey finds - New York Post
articles.description: Almost half of American frontline health care workers haven’t been vaccinated for COVID-19, according to a new poll. The report, published Friday by the Kaiser Family Foundation, found only 5…
articles.content:
Almost half of American frontline health care workers haven’t been vaccinated for COVID-19, according to a new poll.
The report, published Friday by the Kaiser Family Foundation, found only 52 perce… [+933 chars]

articles.author: Doree Lewak, Zachary Kussin
articles.title: These COVID long-haulers still suffer extreme symptoms a year later - New York Post
articles.description: A year after getting COVID, these New Yorkers are still suffering shocking complications — forcing them to give up their jobs and more.
articles.content: Its been a year since COVID-19 really hit New York. But some of the first locals to catch the virus are still experiencing debilitating symptoms that have made it impossible to live life as they were… [+6699 chars]
